oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Robust quasi-sliding mode control of discrete-time systems using multirate output feedback
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: JANARDHANAN, S
BANDYOPADHYAY, B
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In the last few years, the research on discrete-time sliding mode control has received a considerable attention. Unlike its continuous-time counterpart, discrete-time sliding mode control is not robust in general. In this paper, an algorithm is presented for robust discrete-time sliding mode control using the concept of multirate output feedback.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: 2005 IEEE International Conference on Industrial Technology - (ICIT), Vols 1 and 2,395-398
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: IEEE International Conference on Industrial Technology (ICIT),Hong Kong, PEOPLES R CHINA,DEC 14-17, 2005
